  1. If you’re using AVIF images generated by sharp v0.28 or older—they’ll be broken on impending Chrome 93 (currently in Beta). You need to upgrade to sharp v0.29 (available in 🆕 @​11ty/eleventy-img v0.10.0) I expected Chrome would revert this breaking change—yet here we are 🥸
    On twitter.com ♻️ 14 Retweets ❤️ 38 Favorites 2021 Aug 18 Mood -1 🙁
